ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: One more little tidbit on this subject and if it s been stated already, I wholeheartedly apologize for not paying attention. I have heard, from a very official
ygData.messageBody:
One more little tidbit on this subject and if it's been stated already,
I wholeheartedly apologize for not paying attention.

I have heard, from a very official source, that kill stealing is not
illegal. I have also been told, from that very same source, that
trading with someone in battle, therefore disrupting them while they
fight, IS ILLEGAL! It's also a bannable offense.

What's wrong with this picture?

Adira SoulSaver
Bandaid of Tunare
Rodcet Nife Server
